title: Chapter Metadata
description: Schema for the frontmatter of a chapter in the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook.

title.description: The main title of the chapter, displayed in the sidebar and at the top of the page.

sidebar_position.description: The numerical position of the chapter in the sidebar.

chapter_type.description: The pedagogical type of the chapter.

learning_goals.description: A list of key learning goals for the chapter.

prerequisites.description: A list of prerequisite chapters or concepts.

key_takeaways.description: A list of key takeaways or summary points for the chapter.
